item.content: Behold, it came to pass that I, Nephi, did cry much unto the Lord my God, because of the anger of my brethren.
And he shall cast out devils, or the evil spirits which dwell in the hearts of the children of men.
And it came to pass that the days of Ether were in the days of Coriantumr; and Coriantumr was king over all the land.
